metadata.name: /// council 2023
metadata.description:
/// council 1: February 2023 to January 2024

This NTT (non-transferable token) is officially bestowed upon the 15 community-elected adidas ITM holders, who have the privilege and responsibility to counsel the adidas /// studio on their web3 endeavours for 12 months.

For more information, visit https://adidas.com/metaverse and https://discord.gg/adidas

Terms and conditions: https://a.did.as/into_the_metaverse_tc
